name: Dice Chess-GMTK 2022
description:
Notice! Read How to play before you play!

This is a two-player Othello game(of course you can play alone when you are alone, or when you are with your friends you can still play alone), every time you draw a dice-4 before your action.

1 means this piece is Player A's

2 means this piece is Player B's

3 means this piece is a Death Piece(Which means this grid is dead)

4 means unlucky QAQ! This is your opponent's piece and your opponent does the next action twice!

The number will only appear once in a turn consisting of four actions.

The first player to connect three pieces into a line (horizontal or vertical) wins

It's a very simple demo, may you happy while playing it(And after it, even many years after it)
